title: nrupaalavaala kalaadara
sahitya:
nrpAlavAla kalAdhara shEkhara krtAbhi vandana shrI rAma



anupallavi



 nrpOttama sharaNAgata janAgha abja hitnvaya shashAnka



caraNam



 apavarga phala kAmulanu jUci aDDamai aNImAdi siddhula mOsa buccEdarayya 

su-pavitra rUpa sadA karuNajUDu sura pAlaka tyAgarAjanuta
